## Question

Consider the data frame below:

```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(tidyverse)

ex_df <- data.frame(
  id = c(1, 2, 3),
  x_1 = c(3, 1, 4),
  x_2 = c(5, 8, 9),
  y_1 = c(0, 1, 2),
  y_2 = c(2, 7, 9)
)
```

```{r}
ex_df
```

Without using R, write down the data frame that will result from running the following code:

```{r, eval=F}
ex_df |>
  pivot_longer(cols = -id, 
               names_to = c("group", "obs"), 
               values_to = "value",
               names_sep = "_")
```
